description.value:
Choose two skills from the following list: Computers, Culture, Engineering, Life Science, Medicine, Mysticism, Physical Science, and Profession (each Profession chosen separately). The ghoran adds the chosen skills to their list of class skills or gains a +2 species bonus to checks with those skills if they are already class skills.

Class skills can be added in the class item. If one or both of the chosen skills are already class skills, you can select and enable them in the Modifiers tab of this item for the +2 species bonus.
